Review Rating This is the sixth generation of the BMW 3 Series. read more Class-leading handling Sizeable boot Economical engines Manual seats are difficult to adjust Servicing costs can be high Average Owner Review Reversing aid. Absolutely essential as rearward vision is not the best in class. Idrive very good information provider about the car, next service due, inspection, tyre pressures, engine oil level, etc Heated screen washers also excellent touch.
